steps:en-US: Refer to the [template.json](/widgets/template.json) or [template.yaml](/widgets/template.yaml) file, create a JSON or YAML file in the [widgets](/widgets) directory, and fill in the widget information according to the template format.
`pnpm dev` or `pnpm dev:docs` to start the project, check the widget effect.
Use the `pnpm commit` command and select `docs` to submit a PR, wait for merging.

Use o comando `pnpm commit` e selecione `docs` para envio do PR, aguarde o merging.

steps:en-US: Add a new language configuration to the `locales` field in the [meta.json](/meta.json) configuration file.
Add a translated version of the widget information file to the [widgets](/widgets) directory.
Use the `pnpm commit` command and select `docs` to submit a PR, wait for merging.
